          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Rugalmas pontsoron terjedő hullámok</string>
            <string language="en-US">Waves Propagating On Elastic Plot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegt Das Fortpflanzen Auf Elastischem Plot 
Wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondule La Propagation Sur Le Traçage Élastique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acena Propagar No Lote Elástico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fluttua Propagarsi Sul Diagramma Elastico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα που διαδίδουν στην ελαστική πλοκή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agita Propagar En El Diagrama Elástico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A hullámmozgás bevezetése, a hullámok fajtái, a hullámmozgást leíró mennyiségek, polarizáció</string>
            <string language="en-US">Introduction to Wave Motion, Types of Waves, Quantities Describing Wave Motion, Polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>
            <string language="en-US">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hullámok</string>
            <string language="en-US">waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Einleitung, zum der Bewegung, Typen der 
Wellen, die Quantitäten wellenartig zu bewegen, die Welle 
beschreiben, winken, Polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'introduction pour onduler le mouvement, types de
vagues, quantités décrivant la vague font signe, polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A introdução para acenar o movimento, tipos de 
ondas, quantidades que descrevem a onda faz sinal, polarisation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'introduzione per fluttuare il movimento, tipi di
onde, quantità che descrivono l'onda fa segno a, polarizzazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στην κίνηση κυμάτων, τύποι κυμάτων, 
ποσότητες που περιγράφουν την κίνηση κυμάτων, πόλωση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La introducción para agitar el movimiento, tipos 
de ondas, cantidades que describen la onda indica, polarización</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
